sentences.en: When the rice isn't cooked properly it goes lumpy and gooey.
sentences.cn: 米饭煮得不好会结块儿发粘。

sentences.en: If everyone were gooey and lovey-dovey, it would be an obnoxious world.
sentences.cn: 如果每个人都过分多愁善感、情意绵绵，这将是一个令人讨厌的世界。

sentences.en: Specifically, squalene is the gooey oil squeezed from the liver of a shark.
sentences.cn: 确切地说，角鲨烯是从鲨鱼肝脏中挤出的粘稠油。
